item.title: Here’s what the Saylor-Buffett ratio is saying about the market right now
item.description: The relative performance of MicroStrategy and Berkshire Hathaway are a good guide to speculative excess

item.title: The Trump effect is 30% priced in, says Deutsche Bank analyst — here’s why.
item.description: One of the big questions confronting markets is just how much of the impact of a Donald Trump presidency has been priced even before it starts.

item.title: ‘My house is paid off’: How do I ensure my son-in-law never gets my money — even if my daughter dies before he does?
item.description: “I would like it to go to only my daughter and grandchildren.”

item.title: As bitcoin nears $100,000, investors ask whether the rally can last much longer
item.description: Bitcoin’s price has surged since Donald Trump won the elections on Nov. 5. Now, investors are asking how much longer the rally can continue.

item.title: My sister has Alzheimer’s disease. How can I make sure she doesn’t fall victim to scammers?
item.description: “My eldest sister has asked me to take on her power of attorney for her, and together we met with her attorney.”
